messages.message: does anyone know why one would experience 400 when trying to open any .ipynb that they have access to on prod, when other people can open them fine, and other file types seem fine? :pray:
Try a hard refresh - sometimes it's something to do with your cookies
you could try incognito, that would fix it then to
cool will try incognito -- hard refresh doesn't work. thank you! do you know what it is about cookies that results in this happening?
sometimes one of the session cookies instabase uses becomes longer than max size of cookies allowed for browsers on notebook app
got it got it. using longer session cookies beyond supported for notebook app -- is that an intentional thing or a bug?
Iâ€™m not 100% sure of the details. @Ashish might have more context
might be related to this?  potential solution: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1589950764321500
